meanings.definition: A synthetic chemical compound used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed the pyrethroid to protect his crops from pests.
meanings.sent2: The pyrethroid effectively killed the mosquitoes in the area.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ants laughed at the pyrethroid spray, thinking it was a harmless mist.
meanings.sent4: The pyrethroid acted like a shield, repelling all insects from the garden.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of the pyrethroid lingered in the air, signaling its effectiveness.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of synthetic chemicals derived from natural pyrethrins.
meanings.sent1: The company produced a new pyrethroid for use in agricultural settings.
meanings.sent2: Pyrethroids are commonly used in household insect sprays.
meanings.sent3: The pyrethroid chemicals danced together in the laboratory, creating a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like pyrethroids, spreading quickly and effectively through the office.
meanings.sent5: The pyrethroid formula was a breakthrough in pest control, revolutionizing the industry.
